GUYS, IMPORTANT! just in case people may not know how this works..
(this is on snow leopard but i assume it goes for lion too)

resetting the demo worked the first time, but the second time, it didn't with the original fseventer log. this is because it creates folders named with a random string of letters. so it wont be the same twice.

so make sure that once you have removed the files with Universal Demo Remover, repeat steps 1-7. do this every time you reset it!
Worked perfectly for me just following the directions in the help menu for the UDR. Using imac  Snow Leopard 10.6. Been after this for ages. God bless you IKB.
